content.title: EVAR Anatomic Planning and Device Selection
content.description: Critical pre-operative assessment of aortic anatomy for endovascular aneurysm repair to ensure appropriate patient and device selection.

imaging_protocol.cta: 1-2mm slices, arterial phase, from diaphragm to femorals

measurements.diameters: Outer wall to outer wall on axial images

content.access_planning: Evaluate iliac/femoral caliber, calcification, tortuosity for sheath delivery
content.statement: EVAR Anatomic Planning and Device Selection is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Procedures Aortic that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
